backend/main.mo: Motoko actor that handles AI prompt submission (with 500-char limit), stores prompt/response exchange history in a list, and exposes submitPrompt, getHistory, and clearHistory methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (prompt input, conversation display, clear history, theming, hero image) to their source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document providing one-line summaries of each frontend source file, serving as a quick reference for the project's frontend structure.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes including background, foreground, accent, and sidebar tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point that mounts the React app into a root div and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that composes AppHeader, ConversationThread, and PromptInput in a full-height dark layout with a branded footer linking to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header component displaying a hero background image with gradient overlay, logo icon, and the 'PromptAI Studio' title and tagline.
frontend/src/components/ConversationThre: Chat thread component rendering user and AI message bubbles with auto-scroll, a typing indicator, an empty state, and a Clear Conversation button backed by the useClearHistory hook.
frontend/src/components/PromptInput.tsx: Controlled textarea input component with auto-resize, Enter-to-submit, Shift+Enter for newlines, a character counter, loading spinner, and a rose-accent send button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using React Query, supporting both anonymous and authenticated (Internet Identity) configurations, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient creation with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines TanStack Query hooks for fetching conversation history, submitting prompts, and clearing history via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind base/components/utilities, defines warm dark-mode OKLCH CSS custom properties, and adds utility classes for glass cards, message bubbles, and custom scrollbars.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with custom OKLCH-based color tokens (rose, warm palette), typography/display fonts, border radii, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks the project's current state including version, feature inventory, known issues, image requirements, and pending/completed feature requests for the AI prompt chat application.
